alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Ouachita; Union (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 11 at 9:48PM CDT until May 15 at 3:43PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou D`Arbonne At Lake D`Arbonne affecting Lincoln, Ouachita and Union Parishes. For the Bayou D`arbonne...including Lake D`Arbonne...elevated lake levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Bayou D`Arbonne At Lake D`Arbonne. * WHEN...From this evening to Monday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 81.1 feet. - Forecast...The lake is expected to rise to a crest at 82.3 feet early Sunday afternoon. The lake will remain near 82.0 into midweek. - Action stage is 82.3 feet. - Flood stage is 83.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 1045 AM CDT.
